``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - **Humeral-ulnar head**: Medial epicondyle of humerus, Coronoid process of Ulna @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Radial head**: Proximal half of anterior border of radius @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Sides of Middle Phalanges of digit 2-5 @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Median N.]({{< var ref-median-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **Elbow**: Weak Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Wrist**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **MCP & PIP 2-5**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Examination FDS Test
